history.content:
Join Quantum Computing @ Berkeley (QC@B)!

$3 billion dollars were invested in the quantum computing industry in 2021 alone and it will only get more! Quantum computers have the potential to accelerate and revolutionize innovation in drug development, climate change, the financial industry and more.

Curious to learn more? Whether you’re a beginner or experienced, the Quantum Computing @ Berkeley (QC@B) in an inclusive and welcoming environment. Participate in our

  • new member technical education program,
  • quantum computing research projects,
  • research paper reading group,
  • company visits,
  • hackathons,
  • tech talks by industry & academia.

Fill out the recruitment form here, join our Slack to stay updated, and come out to our first info session on Feb 2nd (Groundhog Day!) at 7pm on Zoom, in-person location TBD!

Form: https://airtable.com/shrtEKEW4qizUhx02

Slack: https://join.slack.com/t/qcberkeley/shared_invite/zt-4fjgc7kh-TEmwUZJzQlOdt8CDsfKaFg
history.subject: Join Quantum Computing @ Berkeley!
